Hello again, Mary.

Thank you for your interest in the apartment.

There is a security deposit of 300 Euros that is required upfront. This deposit is refundable at the end of the lease term, provided there are no damages to the apartment.

As for pets, we do not allow any pets in the apartment.

As for furniture, you are welcome to bring your own furniture, as long as it fits within the space and does not damage the apartment.

Please let me know if you have any additional questions or concerns. I'm happy to help.
